Суть игры заключается в том, что есть четыре жертвы и один маньяк. Маньяку нужно поймать и посадить на крюк всех жертв и дождаться пока они умрут в мучениях. А задача жертв запустить пять генераторов, открыть выход и сбежать. Я очень сильно удивился, что игра четыре против одного может быть сбалансирована и интересна.
Игра веселая и явно заслуживает вашего внимания. Тут и атмосфера и геймплей, и музыкальное сопровождение на высоте. Оптимизация тоже на уровне, фпс ровный без просадок. В общем рекомендую.

DO NOT BUY THIS GAME IN ITS CURRENT STATE!

It is fun adult hide 'n' seek and the potential is there for it to be a great game and make no mistake, I am having a LOT of fun with it. Capturing survivors, hooking them, trapping them, chasing them. Great stuff.

But the game is just so broken I have to wonder why they released it in it's current state. The bugs wouldn't even be that annoying if they didn't directly effect the stupid scoring system they have you abide by.

4/10. It can be so much better if they fix it.

Das Spiel ist super - doch die Spieler machen es kaputt...
Es gibt auf einigen Maps Stellen, wo man als Survivor immer zwischen 2-3 Fenster hindurchschlüpfen kann, ohne dass der Killer überhaupt den Hauch einer Chance hat ranzukommen... Sehr schade, dass viele Spieler dies so eiskalt ausnutzen und damit den eig. sehr spannenden und horrorartigen Spieleffekt zerstören und die "Jagd" somit stark ins lächerliche ziehen. Außerdem gibt es noch Spieler, die anstatt sofort zu fliehen erstmal noch weitere Generatoren reparieren, Fleischerhaken zerstören und noch ein paar Holzplanken umwerfen... einfach nur um Punkte zu farmen! 

Fazit: Wenn man 4 Freunde hat, mit denen man private Matches spielen kann ist das Spiel extrem gut und spannend! Spielt man ranked gegen Randoms kann es durchaus den selben Effekt haben. Im Low-Rank-Bereich macht das Spiel noch Spaß, je höher der Rank, desto höher die Anzahl der Survivor, die nur auf Punkte aus sind...

Das Spiel an sich ist sehr gut, sowohl die Idee als auch die Umsetzung. In vielen Rezensionen wird angemerkt, dass bestimmte "window-cheese-spots" das Spielerlebnis für den Killer zum Albtraum machen, allerdings stimmt das nur zu einem sehr geringen Anteil. Ich hab auch schon oft genug gegen Leute gespielt die die genannten spots nutzen und sich auch nachdem ich sie geschlagen habe geheilt haben. Daraus wird dann schnell ein "Mindgame" und wenn man es richtig spielt schafft man es auch. Wie bereits der Spielentwickler selbst in einem seiner Q&A Streams auf Twitch gesagt hat: "Get good!". Auch zu den Vorwürfen es sei unbalanced bin auch ganz anderer Meinung. Alle drei Killer haben ihre einzigartigen Skills und Spielweisen, jedoch ist keiner von ihnen OP oder im Ganzen unbalanced. Eine Lösung für das Problem mit dem Windowcheese ist bereits bei den Entwicklern in Arbeit und sie kennen die spots in den Maps, wo das besonders missbraucht wird. Aber aufgrund von einer Sache kann man meiner Meinung nach nicht ein ganzes Spiel negativ bewerten. 
Den einzigen wirklichen Kritikpunkt den ich bislang habe ist, dass es keinen Partymode an sich gibt, um zusammen gegen andere "Randoms" zu spielen, sowie Hacker die sich Bloodpoints ercheaten und alles direkt freischalten. Glücklicherweise spielen die Hacker dann trotzdem grottig und haben auch trotz ihres cheats keine große chance. 
Alles in allem kann man dem Spiel eine Wertung von 8/10 geben, welche sich nach oben verbessert wenn der Partymode integriert, Cheesespots verhindert und Hacker gebannt werden. Auch nach mittlerweile 26h Spielzeit ist es definitiv nicht langweilig, klare Kaufempfehlung!

Bei mir gibt es momentan leider zu viele Probleme um dieses Spiel zu empfehlen...

Aber erstmal das Positive:

+ Das Spielkonzept ist spannend und begeistert
+ Technische Umsetzung (Grafik und Ton) ist super und sträkt die Immersion

Jetzt zum Negativen:

- Es dauert eine Ewigkeit eine volle Lobby zu bekommen.
Entweder sind sich die Highlevel Spieler zu schade um mit Neulingen zu spielen und verlassen die Lobby oder wenn man endlich eine Lobby mit 5 Spielern gefunden hat, landet man ohne eine Meldung/Begründung wieder im Hauptmenü.
- "Dead by Daylight" funktioniert nichtmehr. 
Nichts frustriert mehr, als während der Reperatur des letzten Generators oder dem Hängen des letzten Spielers aus dem Spiel zu fliegen. Von ca. 20 Spielen konnte ich maximal 5 Spiele beenden. Bei allen anderen ist das Spiel abgestürzt.



Wenn man, wie bei anderen Spielen, die Ränge der Mitspieler erst nach der Runde sehen kann und das Spiel stabil läuft wird es sicher wieder Spaß machen, so jedoch nicht.

Schade um das Konzept, hoffentlich ändert sich bald was...

Игра вышла в свет относительно недавно, поэтому сильно придираться не будем.
Игра представляет собой хоррор в стиле выживания/охоты. У четверых выживших общая задача - завести 5 генераторов и сбежать, но препятствовать этому будет маньяк/монстр. В игре есть 3 вида маньяка/монстра. У каждого из маньяков своя специальная возможность (Капканы, бензопила, невидимость), и свои специальные перки, которые можно прокачивать получая опыт. Игра ненадоедает т.к. у вас всегда есть к чему стремиться. У выживших тоже есть свои специальные возможности (аптечка,ломать крюки и т.д.). Играя за выживших, у вас есть выбор - либо вы будете держаться в команде и по возможности помогать своим товарищам, либо жертвуя товарищами, которые нуждаются в помощи идти к победе...
Хоть игра и новая, в ней довольно таки мало минусов, сейчас я перечислю основные.
-
1. Русский язык... А вернее его отсутствие. Очень сложно разобраться во всех этих перках и вещах.
2. Нельзя звать друзей в открытое лобби, можно конечно создать закрытое, но где вы найдете 5 людей?
3. Failed to join the game... Иногда нужно нажать кнопку "Поиск" от 5 до 15 раз, не знаю с чем это связано...
4. Я даже не знаю, плохо ли это... Но упомянуть стоит - в игре нету средств общения - не микрофон, не чат. Чат конечно есть, но только в лобби.
Ну, из минусов вроде все...
Теперь, перечислю плюсы.
+
1. Атмосфера страха и волнения. 10/10
2. Довольная низкая цена.
3. Много персонажей.
4. Раунд состоит только из людей, никаких тупых ботов. Возможность игры как за живых, так и за убийцу.
5. Эмоции незабываемые.
6. Довольно таки интересный сюжет и задумка у игры.
Игра отличная, без учета того, что на игру не выходило не одно обновление ( игра вышла 14.06.16 ).
Моя оценка - 9.2/10 
От себя хочу добавить - игра очень крута тем, что в ней перед тобой всегда стоит право выбора - представьте ситуацию, где-то недалко от вас бродит маньяк и рядом ваш союзник попал в капкан... Что вам делать? Рискнуть и попробовать спасти союзника? Или бросить его на растерзание маньяку... В этом и состоит вся фишка игры! 
Однозначно советую!

Yes , I agree that this game needs to do something with the friend mode, but I definitely dont understand why many players keep arguing about no rewards when playing private match or being unable to play with friends against the other players. Honestly, if these are available, the game will definitely turn to be very unfair as some " friends" can cheat together to gain blood points. ( such as the friendly killer let his friend survivors escape) 

Overall, the game is good and it brings back childhood memories. In which, I love hide and seek. And I think it is awkward for me as an adult to play hide and seek with others publicly. But now I can play it with the game.

Several bug issues need to be fixed. Waiting in the lobby for too long...etc.

*UPDATE after 4 years* I have played this game for over 300 hours and it never let me down. That's it. But the time waiting in the lobby is still too long... maybe it is because of the time zone.

无法忍受这糟糕的游戏优化还有一堆莫名其妙的BUG以及几乎等于没有的反作弊措施，玩屠夫开局走了几步路不知怎么就被传送到了地图外边，不管是别的玩家开挂传送的我还是本来就有的BUG，这对一个成品游戏来说是无法原谅的，你们应该也猜得到这一把游戏我是怎么结束的，眼睁睁在地图围栏外面看着地图里一个个爆米花无可奈何，后来我就跳下了地图边缘的悬崖，很可怕这居然是一个无底洞，我就这样一直掉啊自由落体到一整局游戏结束……难道我买了个游戏就是为了看着天空之城一样遥远的偷电贼在我头顶上爆米花一边还自由落体么？
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
我以为这就是这些高科技偷电贼的极限了，想不到之后一把更让我这个朴实农场主心寒……一位艺高胆大的偷电贼当着我的面爆米花，我过去抡起锤子正准备教训他却被他一个葵花点穴手定在了发电机旁边，只能一动不动……没错，甚至连视角都无法转动……我呆呆的看着在一声声爆米花中发电机的电被偷电贼得意的榨干默默地删了游戏退款 ：） 
    弯腰驼背衣冠不整只为了守护自己庄园的朴实农场主，最终败给了手握高科技的超现代偷电贼。
    南无三，这是何等的正不胜邪！
————————————————————————————————————————————————————
我以为能退款的，南无三，G胖的智慧再次让我感到绝望以及身为一个天真小玩家的无力！无慈悲，当我试图退款黎明偷电的时候记录在案正好两小时，而当初我购买黎明偷电时与消逝的光芒信徒加强版和污师3季票一起购买，属于同一笔订单内容，sbeam客服给我的退款清单标上了这笔订单所有的内容却只退给我54rmb的黎明偷电钱退款。看到这个我咕哇一下吐出一口老血，这么亏本的买卖我当然不答应！
Aieeeee……54块钱的喜加一 ：）
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------————————————————————————————————
Oops~现在到了八月21号，我听说更新了官方中文和新农场主新图就又回来玩了一会儿，这两个月里游戏进步还是很大的，游戏环境不再那么糟糕，虽然优化还是一如既往的差，但对这个游戏的进步我还是给予肯定，故此改成好评( *・ω・)✄╰ひ╯

Игра бесспорно достойна всяких похвал! К сожалению в игровой индустрии ветка жанра Хоррор ни кем толком то и не занята, поэтому годноты не так уж и много. После сюжетных The Evil Within & Alan Wake я не мог найти ни одной игры, которая смогла бы порадовать своей задумкой и уж тем более ни одной игры которая подразумевала полноценный мультиплеер. 

Dead by daylight отличный мультиплееровский Хоррор, очень атмосферный и заставляет поистине насладиться щекоткой легкого ужаса от обстановки играя за бедолагу Выжившего , или же проникнуться безумием и отыграть за Маньяка. В общем решать Вам, но я точно могу сказать что игра даже на тестовых версиях уже очень не плохо интригует своей задумкой.

2) нет руссификатора
โดยรวมสนุกมาก มีระบบจับคู่กับเพื่อนไปเล่นกับคนอื่นมั้ย หาเจอหรือยังไม่มี

So, I have near 3K hours (including the 200+ on my husband's account as well) in this game and have literally sunk hundreds of dollars into it, supporting it. I've played since launch, during one down moris and perma-sabo hooks and all the other nonsense. 

This is the first time DBD has been NOT FUN. Up to this point, I could still find fun in the game, whether playing with friends or goofing off or whatever. However, when people are getting literally face camped at 5 gens over and over and over again, it just turns into an experience in tedium.

This last patch broke me.

This review is on DbD.1.01
(not a native speaker, pls take that into account)

I would like to give you some insight about the two edges of the same sword, Dead by Daylight is...

+++: The TONS of FUN
If you have 4 or more friends to play with, this game delivers fun for hours, even days. You'll laugh alot and you'll complain alot about your friends, leading the killer directly on your trail, leaving you hanging from the tip of a hook at the end of the day. At the same time, you get kind of happy, seeing the killer chasing down one of your friends, for it means you can have your time with the generator. 
You will percieve your own heartbeat as the killer roams your area, sometimes just inches away form your characters model, without seeing you, as long as you don't move. 
You will curse yourself for running away and give in your position,  when the killer is heading your way, without having you actually spotted at the beginning. 
This game is a lot of fun, if you and your friend can set up some simple rules:
- no hard hook camping
- no window hopping

... the bad part is... those rules are ignored online.

---: Lame online gamplay
All the fun you have with your friends vanishes into the mists of point farming, when playing this game online. People are less than seldom interested in helping you from a hook or quit the game as soon as they are hooked themselves, sometimes even before they actually hit the ground from the second hit the killer needs to ground them. But who can be mad at them?
If you got hooked, killer is more than likely staying at your hook and watching you die, even though the others will get some generators done in this time, because your death equals points for him. 
Playing this game online is the TRUE HORROR you will experience... For it is ALL about points and keeping items, addons and perks, on both sides. 

Conclusion:
If you have friends to play and skype with, this game is a must have and will keep you entertained for quite a while.
If you don't have enough friends (...poor little thing you are...), don't by the game unless issues are fixed.

Note: There are quite some mechanical problems in the game. Namely, weird engine behavior and display issues. Mostly, they are harmless and can be ignored for the fun having with your friends.
The games fun

Had to change my review. The last patch actually helped. I hope they continue this trend. Lots of salty exploiters on the forums now, but what can you do. The game still has huge bugs, but I can over look them, as the biggest issue (D/Cers) has been taken care of. People still D/C, but now they are just handing points to the other side when they do. Anti-cheat is still a joke, but they say they are working on it, and after the last patch, I actually believe them.

Not recommended to buy right now due to many exploits and cheating rampant in the game.

1. Anyone can disconnect right before being sacraficed to avoid losing rank and denying rank of the killer, with no penalty EDIT: all developers did for this issue was shuffle the problem to the survivors so now a killer can DC and the survivors will not gain ranks, basically developers are kneejerk nerfing survivors into the ground and giving killers free points for doing nothing
2. Infinite window and pallet exploits can cause games to go on for hours untill the killer decides to DC EDIT: more survivor nerfs, game is more unfun than ever, good luck winning as anything but killer
3. Rank 1 cheaters who only climbed the ranks by D/C, and never being punished for their loses, EDIT: still rank 1s who have not been punished for their ranks after the patch
4. Toxic community spawned by above reasons, players have no consideration for others and will disconnect their game at the slightest sign of losing their pip
5. Win trading and boosting becoming rampant due to easily exploited point system
6. Did i mention bugs? stuck in walls, stuck on rocks, stuck on corners, stuck on everything making you a nice sitting duck for killer

Dont buy untill they patch all of these issues out of the game, playing the game with these issues will only bring frustration and dissapointment

After a while, four survivors fill the lobby, all finally readying up for a bit of a game. I hover briefly over each to check levels and names: One is called 'Drizzy is AIDS.' I silently tell myself that this player is going to end up being a real jackass.

I run around the level, snatching mo'fuckas up in bear traps and slinging people onto meat hooks. It's well-fought, but the team doesn't work together, and divided they fall. After a few minutes, I've gotten three sacrifices. Notably absent from the list? You've guessed it--Mr. AIDS.

Drizzy doesn't even bother to try and start generators. After about five more minutes of running around looking for him, I decide to just wait for him to disconnect or try to escape, passing the time by reading some guides for killers that are new to the game.

Ten more minutes pass. No movement. Nothing in the guides tell me about these sorts of players, but it doesn't take long before it dawns on me: Drizzy is hiding somewhere, trying to force me into quitting in a fit of rage. I smile as I begin the tedious task of checking every damned locker in the level.

Locker after locker with no Drizzies inside pass before I realize that this guy is probably hiding where he assumes I'll never look. I head to the basement, replete with blood, gore, and baling hooks, only to begin checking lockers. I finally get to the furthest locker and open it up, and would you guess who was cowering inside? Drizzy! The reunion is sweet as the P.o.S. starts screaming, right before I lovingly slide his wriggling body onto a sharpened, curved piece of pig iron.

Drizzy doesn't plan on staying there, however: As I watch, he somehow frees himself from my beautiful contraption, only to fall to the floor limping and bleeding. I observe somewhat detachedly, a grin spreading across my face, as our hapless protagonist attempts to run upstairs.

A crude machete cuts Drizzy down as he reaches the top flight, leaving him crawling on the cold stone floors in pools of his own blood. I find myself standing over him, watching curiously as his life meter drains; he drags himself around the map, grunting as he does so.

After about three minutes of me waiting, his life meter finally has only a sliver left. Humming a sweet little show tune to myself, I pick up our friend and drag his ass back to the basement, throwing him up on a hook yet again. I set a bear trap under his feet as he dangles there, looking quite troubled, indeed. 

As Drizzy attempts, yet again, to drop himself from the hook into the waiting jaws of the bear trap below, our eyes finally meet. Gazes lock as the pain of torment, loss, and even betrayal simultaneously flash across that beautifully-lotioned face of his. I smile for the last time as I whisper softly to our good friend Drizzy: "-I- am the AIDS, Drizzy... -I- am the AIDS." 

I could have sworn that he nodded, eyes full of recognition as they started to turn gray. He stops struggling, going completely limp. I stroke his sweet, sweet afro as netherworldly appendages arrive to impale him. "-I- am the AIDS, Drizzy. -I- am the AIDS."

11/10 would be the AIDS again

Takes forever to get into a game. Everyone fucking quits the lobby over and over for no reason whatsoever.

Absolutely no way to communicate with teammates in-game. Plus you dont spawn by each other. Whoever is unlucky enough to spawn near the killer is basically SoL because you can only hope and pray your team will be competent enough to save you.  

Why there's not chat in any form just baffles me. Is it supposed to be fair? Is it supposed to be realistic? Because it does nothing but give the killer an even bigger advantage.

Lets also not forget how big of a disadvantage the humans are at. Only way to outrun the killer who is faster than you? Sprint. What happens if you sprint? Killer can endlessly hunt you down with scratches. What happens if you're injured and trying to run away? Well, you die. You physically cant outrun the killer, and you cant run till your out of his sight and hide because the marks let him track you to wherever you want to hide.

This game has become a mediocre game from when it first started, in 2016 I rated this game 8/10 however I am giving it 4/10 going forward. 
Never mind the 450+ hours I’ve clocked, but the entire experience has been dreadful, i've never played a game that frustrates me as much as this one. From killers camping & wrecking the game, survivors simply disconnecting randomly when they sense they're gonna lose, you name it.

1.)  Firstly, they have this stupid Season Reset system which resets player's Ranks every so often. What this means is that everyone essentially starts back at Rank 16-20. So a person with 3,000 hours as a killer may face 3-4 survivors with 50+ hours and annihilate the game (and vice versa). This creates a very unfair game and you would want to quit as a new starter.

2.) Unlike other team games (like TF2) where you can still carry across if you end up with dudd player or 2 (from the 4), this game heavily relies on ALL 4, so if you have a bad one in your team, you'll most likely all end up dead

3.) The Devs seem to Buff & Nerf various killers/survivors very frequently, you can never master a player without either that playing being buffed or nerfed. This shows that after 2 years the game is imbalanced.

4.) They try and discourage the killers from camping however they create perks that simply promote it like Dying Light where you have to kill 1 specific survivor to gain an advantage.

Sorry for the new-comers who don't understand some of the points above as they're specific but don't spend $19.99 unless you've played imbalanced games and happy to try and have fun.

[h1]Un juego excelente[/h1]

El juego ha cambiado para bien, ahora si es divertido jugar de asesino, ahora sobrevivir es mas un reto por lo tanto me parece correcto, los desarrolladores estan pendiente de su comunidad, y por ello escribo este nuev analisis, ahora si es juego en condiciones lo recomiendo.

Despite some minor and occassional glitches, this is quite an addictive game. Both perspectives, killer and survivor, are emensely fun to play. The skill tree is delightfully strategic as levels progress. Perfect 5/7!

Great game. Here is the quick and simple:

- Can be intense as a survivor, inducing some horror elements (good).
- Lots of potential (good).
- Glitches, but few and apparently being worked on (good).
- Ranking system (good).
- In-game items (good).
- No matchmaking (bad).
- No penalties for leaving early, which hurt opposing player/s (bad).
- Lobby uncontrolled, leaving good players leaving and restarting matches to match up with better players (bad).
- No friend option for public matches (bad).
- No in game chat or voice within distance chat (biggest pet peeve).

Most of the things I have listed are bad, but I feel they will be fixed.  The developers seem to listen and respond to players, so hopefully things progress since this game is alread fun, but can be really, really good.  So given that, the good in this game will outweigh the bad.

=======================================================================
UPDATE

PROS:
After returning over 2 years later, I can honestly say that the devs have put a lot more work into the game. There are many killers now, all with unique powers and new perks to keep everything fresh, which is nice. Same for the survivers, all have recived lots of new additions. I also noticed many really abused infinite loop palate areas have been patched up or fixed all together which is a nice thing to see. Also a ton of new maps which change the style of how you play, e.x, some maps are way more open, while others will be closed off more. They even increased the tick rate on the servers which is a major gain for everybody.  

CONS:
While most infinite loop spots have been fixed, there are about 20 different bugs that haven't been and they are game breaking when exploited. To give context, I mostly run killer because thats how I enjoy the game, and the more and more lower ranked you go in DBD the more of these bugs and exploits get abused each game. 
For example, Its VERY common to find teams of 4 people who, when carrying a hooked survivor, will rush the hook and stand in the exact spot that bugs the UI so you are UNABLE to hook the survivor. Not being able to hook the survivor in DBD, which is your primary goal, is absolultey game breaking, and the fact that all they have to do is stand in a certain spot to "glitch it out" shines light on how well the devs are at fixing basic issues. This issue was in the game when I left and is still here to this day. 

My next and last complaint about the game, is more towards the community that plays it, and less about the game. Although, the game, and how it functions, does lead to players acting with this behavior. It is VERY common for to dissconect from the match if they even have the smallest idea that they are going to lose. This wouldn't be a huge issue, except for the fact that it can cause you to not rank up or maybe even derank if enough people disconnect early on. Why give the survivors this power? It gets to the point where I will catch someone going over a pallet and they will DC in my arms 2 seconds after, and now I have to be punished for that? Why not have a leaving penatlity? Why is this STILL an issue in this game?

Overall this game is a blast to play, but some of its issues make it really hard to continuely play. You basicly shoot a gamble with each match, and hope the survivors don't know the glitches or good luck.

Being a killer is to hard when you face a lvl 7 survivor not because they are better or anything just the sheer fact they can hop windows over and over again while the other 3 do whatever they want. What im supposed to leave this survivor who out of no skill can just taunt any killer this way? after awhile the ledge or window should break so they cant be utterly gay the whole game. it makes sense to use it because it is one of the few ways to escape a killer but the repeated usage of it is fucking ridiculous. fix it or the game will stay broken.
Incredible. Simple and efective. Graphs are great the pace is full of suspense. Wish it had single player mode, for example Assasins vs bots-AI-survivors...other than that, amazing

殺人鬼VS4人のサバイバーの命をかけた鬼ごっこゲーム
……といえば聞こえは良いのですが、このゲームの実態は少々違っています。
コンセプトは面白く、基本となる部分も面白いものだと思うのですが、ゲームコンセプトと実際のゲームデザインとの齟齬があり、「コンセプト通り」のゲームにならないのが大きな問題だと感じます。
では、個人的に問題があると思う部分について列挙します。これは2106/6/28段階でのものであり、それ以降のパッチで変更されている可能性もあります。

1.勝利条件
基本的な部分としては、サバイバーが出口に電力を送る発電機を規定数直し、出口を開けて脱出する、というものです。
しかし、このゲームの問題は「脱出すればサバイバーの勝利」「全員殺せば殺人鬼の勝利」……とはならないことです。
このゲームでの勝利条件は、双方ともに「規定のポイントを稼ぐこと」にあります。
サバイバーの場合は脱出を達成する他、発電機の修理や、殺人鬼の近くに一定時間滞在することでポイントが入ります。脱出するだけでは勝利のポイントに届きません。
対して殺人鬼の場合も、サバイバーを捕まえて生け贄にする他、それぞれのキャラごとのスキルを使用した回数などによってポイントが入ります。こちらも、もし4人殺害をしたとしても、それだけでは勝利となりません。

その結果どういうことが起こるのかというと……
殺人鬼は捕らえたサバイバーを吊り下げたフックの目の前でスキルの発動を繰り返してポイントを稼ぐようになり
サバイバーは脱出経路が解放されたにも関わらずマップに残って、もう本来直す必要のない発電機を直したり、わざと殺人鬼の目の前に姿を表して逃げまわったりし始めることになります。

……単純に、捕まったら負け、捕まえたら勝ちではいけなかったのでしょうか……？もう逃げられるのに敢えてポイント稼ぎをしている様などは、極めて滑稽です。おちょくるのが最適解という、知らない人からすれば不愉快なプレイヤーばかりのゲームに見えてしまうのが現状です。

2.レベル制
このゲームはいわゆる非対称形の対人ゲームです。
この時点でもって、上手くバランスをとるのは非常に難しいものとなっているのは、先例（Evolve等）からしても明らかです。
しかしながら、このゲームはこのただでさえバランスを取るのが難しい非対称ゲームに於いて、キャラクターのレベルアップシステムを搭載しています。

繰り返しプレイをしている人は、当然ながら段々とマップを覚えていくなど、プレイヤースキルが向上していきます。
そして、さらに繰り返しプレイによって獲得したポイントによって、キャラクターが強化されます。
……このような構造は、現在のように人数が多い環境であればまだある程度許容できるかも知れませんが、少しでも人数が減ってくるとたやすくバランスを崩壊させるのではないでしょうか。
同じようなレベルの人とマッチングしないようになると……もう二度とバランスが取れないゲームになってしまうように思います。……これも先例が示しているように。

3.発電機の修理システム
これは、もうそこそこいい年になっているオッサンの嘆きであって、このゲーム自体の根本的な問題ではないのですが……。
私の反射神経では発電機の修理中に発生するインタラクトが全く成功しません！
なんとかして下さい！？もうちょっと、もうちょっと条件を緩くして頂いても良いのではないでしょうか！？
こんなんじゃ私、殺人鬼しかできなくなっちまうよ……！（勝てるわけではない）

4.コミュニケーションの問題
……気を取り直して、最後に、このゲームに於けるもう1つ重要な問題として「コミュニケーション」があります。
サバイバー側は脱出のために4人で協力をしなければならないという作りになっているものの、このゲームにはチャットは愚かラジオボタンすら存在していません。
つまり、各々の行動からしか、「味方」が何をしようとしているのか全く分からないということです。

これ自体は、「プレイの中で連携」を目指すエクスペリエンスとして、そこまで悪いものだとは思いません。
しかし問題なのは、この中に「意図的にフレンドとマッチングしようとする」勢力が存在している場合です。
基本としてコミュニケーションが取れないゲームの中で、例えば2人だけであってもボイスチャットで繋がっているようなことがあれば、どうなるでしょうか。
本来ならば僅かな情報を繋ぎあわせて殺人鬼の居場所を推測し、安全な行動を選択しなければならないサバイバー側ですが、もしリアルタイムで連絡を取れる人がいれば「殺人鬼こっちにいるよ」「OK発電機直すわ」/「捕まったけど近くに殺人鬼いないよ」「OK助けに行くわ」で全てが崩壊します。

これならまだマシな方で、殺人鬼とサバイバーの1人がフレンドだった場合、「こっちにサバイバーいるわ」「OK狩るわ」が可能です。勿論ポイントも、2人いれば近くに滞在するだけで稼げるのですから、他全員を美味しく料理した後に部屋の隅っこでじっとしていれば両者勝利です。バカバカしいではありませんか。

今後、フレンドとのプレメイドマッチングを実装するとのことですが、これをする場合にはどのようにバランスを取るつもりなのでしょうか。
そのまま実装すれば鬼は圧倒的に不利となります。
しかし、鬼を強化したり、サバイバーを弱体化するようなことがあれば、今度は「ソロプレイヤー」が不利となります。
……ゲームデザインの根幹に関わる部分に、克服することが難しい問題が存在しているのではないでしょうか。

個人的にはパーティプレイ層には頑張って5人集めてプライベートマッチでやってもらうようにするとして、途中切断のペナルティを非常に重くし、かつ、マッチング画面で誰とマッチングしているのか全くわからない状態にしてしまうのが一番良いと思うのですが……。

総括すると、「5人集められないのならば、今のところはオススメできないゲーム」です。
私は友達がいませんのでこの評価です。

Эта одна из тех немногих игр, которая держит в напряжении. Играя в нее, невольно выкрикиваешь слова, типа: "Нет...", "Почему именно я?", "Хоть бы ты не заглянул сюда!!!". В игре есть некоторые недочеты и недоработки (*оптимизация или гибкость в настройках. *Незназначительные "фризы" в момент погони и д.), но ради такой атмосферы... это простительно...
